author: Gulzaar jindagi
text:
This is the beauty of shaheer's characters that almost everyone can relate to his any one character
Like I have seen die heart fans for both Dev and abir 
For me also dev is more relatable as somehow I am like him
But it  doesn't mean I do not love abir, he is sucha a positivity

author: Gulzaar jindagi
text:
Actually the thing is people who can relate with abir more like with his Banjara, jovial nature find him more intense and relatable
People who can rate with Dev's life struggles and his nature find him more relatable and intense+ https://t.co/u2oXDBYavF
